橾橾橾

橾字的基本解释

橾
shū
车毂中间穿车轴的孔。

橾
qiāo
古同“锹”，铁锹。

橾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》山芻切，平虞，生。］
车毂中贯轴的空腔。
[②]［qiāo］
［《集韻》千遥切，平宵，清。］
鉄锹。
[③]［sāo］
［《洪武正韻》蘇曹切］
木长貌。

橾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页555第35
【唐韻】山芻切，音毹。【說文】車軸中空也。　又【集韻】春朱切，音樞。又蘇后切，音瞍。義?同。　又【集韻】千遙切。同?。鍫也。　又【正韻】蘇曹切，音騷。槮本字。櫹橾，長貌。見槮字註。

橾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橾字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
shū
The hole for the axle in the middle of the hub.
Li
qiāo
Ancient with "shovel", shovel.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shū］
["Guang Yun" Shan Xiao cut, Ping Yu, raw. ]
The cavity of the shaft in the hub.
[②]［qiāo］
["Ji Yun" Qianyao cut, evening, and Qing. ]
Iron spade.
[③] [sāo]
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Su Caoqie]
Mu long appearance.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橾; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 555 35
[Tang Yun] The mountain is chopped, and the sound is slapped. [Said the text] The axle is also hollow.　 [Ji Yun] Chun Zhu cut, sound pivot. Su cut back again, the sound of the scorpion. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] A thousand distant cuts. with?.鍫 also.　[Zheng Yun] Su Cao Qi, Yin Sao.槮本字. Qiuyue, long-looking. See the note to the word 槮.
Li
